titles.title: To provide for the temporary reduction of duty on synthetic quartz substrates.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/5/1998--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 2000, the duty on synthetic quartz substrates imported into the United States in bulk or in forms or packages for retail sale.
